#summary Simple guide to set up local development environment for the project

= Eclipse & Tomcat =

 * Download (if not already) [http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk7-downloads-1880260.html JDK1.7] 

 * Download and extract [https://eclipse.org/downloads/packages/eclipse-ide-java-ee-developers/lunar Eclipse Luna for JavaEE]

 * Download and extract [http://tomcat.apache.org/download-80.cgi Apache Tomcat 8.0.15] (Core)
  

 * Install svn plugin for eclipse ([https://eclipse.org/subversive/documentation/gettingStarted/aboutSubversive/install.php detailed instructions here])

 * Checkout /trunk/PracticalExamples project to test the environment (check PracticalExamples/README.md for more info)

-----
= MySQL =
 
 * Install [http://dev.mysql.com/downloads/mysql/#downloads MySQL 5.6.22] 
 * Run all scripts in _PracticalExamples/db/setupDatabase.sql_, 3 first commands must be executed by mysql root user
  (could use [http://docs.phpmyadmin.net/en/latest/setup.html phpMyAdmin] to have nice mysql user interface)
 * Go to http://localhost:8080/PracticalExamples/suggest, post a suggestion and test if it is inserted to the database.
